sqlMap.select:
select * from IRP_USER
order by $orderByClause$

select DISTINCT(u.USERID),u.USERNAME,u.SUMSCORE,u.SUMEXPERIENCE,(SELECT SUM(SCORE) FROM IRP_USER_VALUE_LINK where USERID=u.USERID AND crtime > #beginDate:TIMESTAMP# and crtime < #endDate:TIMESTAMP#) as NUMSCORE ,(SELECT SUM(EXPERIENCE) FROM IRP_USER_VALUE_LINK) as NUMEXPERIENCE from IRP_USER u
$sql$
select * from IRP_USER where USERID = #userid:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into IRP_USER (USERID, STATUS, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, SEX, TRUENAME, LOCATION, TEL, MOBILE, EMAIL, REMINDERQUESTION, REMINDERANSWER, IFPUBMYINFO, FIRSTLOGINTIME, REGTIME, LOGINTIMES, LASTLOGINTIME, LASTLOGOUTTIME, MSGINTERVAL, VIEWINTERVAL, ATTRIBUTE, CRUSER, CRTIME, PASSWORDLEV, USERLEVEL, USERSM, USERYM, USERPINYIN, SYNSRCID, USERPROVINCE, USERPIC, EXPERTINTRO, DOMAIN, CRUSERID, QQ, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, BIRTHDAY, SUMSCORE, SUMEXPERIENCE, SPECIALTYPE, QQTOKEN, QQUSERID, WEIBOTOKEN, WEIBOUSERID, HOLIDAY,TOKEN,ANSWERCOUNT,EXPERTTYPE,DENSE) values (#userid:DECIMAL#, #status:DECIMAL#, #username:VARCHAR#, #password:VARCHAR#, #nickname:VARCHAR#, #sex:DECIMAL#, #truename:VARCHAR#, #location:VARCHAR#, #tel:VARCHAR#, #mobile:VARCHAR#, #email:VARCHAR#, #reminderquestion:VARCHAR#, #reminderanswer:VARCHAR#, #ifpubmyinfo:DECIMAL#, #firstlogintime:TIMESTAMP#, #regtime:TIMESTAMP#, #logintimes:DECIMAL#, #lastlogintime:TIMESTAMP#, #lastlogouttime:TIMESTAMP#, #msginterval:DECIMAL#, #viewinterval:DECIMAL#, #attribute:VARCHAR#, #cruser:VARCHAR#, #crtime:TIMESTAMP#, #passwordlev:DECIMAL#, #userlevel:DECIMAL#, #usersm:VARCHAR#, #userym:VARCHAR#, #userpinyin:VARCHAR#, #synsrcid:VARCHAR#, #userprovince:DECIMAL#, #userpic:VARCHAR#, #expertintro:VARCHAR#, #domain:VARCHAR#, #cruserid:DECIMAL#, #qq:VARCHAR#, #province:VARCHAR#, #city:VARCHAR#, #area:VARCHAR#, #birthday:TIMESTAMP#, #sumscore:DECIMAL#, #sumexperience:DECIMAL#, #specialtype:DECIMAL#, #qqtoken:VARCHAR#, #qquserid:VARCHAR#, #weibotoken:VARCHAR#, #weibouserid:VARCHAR#, #holiday:DECIMAL#, #token:VARCHAR#, #answercount:DECIMAL#, #experttype:DECIMAL#,#dense:DECIMAL#)

sqlMap.update:
update IRP_USER
USERID = #record.userid:DECIMAL#
STATUS = #record.status:DECIMAL#
USERNAME = #record.username:VARCHAR#
PASSWORD = #record.password:VARCHAR#
NICKNAME = #record.nickname:VARCHAR#
SEX = #record.sex:DECIMAL#
TRUENAME = #record.truename:VARCHAR#
LOCATION = #record.location:VARCHAR#
TEL = #record.tel:VARCHAR#
MOBILE = #record.mobile:VARCHAR#
EMAIL = #record.email:VARCHAR#
REMINDERQUESTION = #record.reminderquestion:VARCHAR#
REMINDERANSWER = #record.reminderanswer:VARCHAR#
IFPUBMYINFO = #record.ifpubmyinfo:DECIMAL#
FIRSTLOGINTIME = #record.firstlogintime:TIMESTAMP#
REGTIME = #record.regtime:TIMESTAMP#
LOGINTIMES = #record.logintimes:DECIMAL#
LASTLOGINTIME = #record.lastlogintime:TIMESTAMP#
LASTLOGOUTTIME = #record.lastlogouttime:TIMESTAMP#
MSGINTERVAL = #record.msginterval:DECIMAL#
VIEWINTERVAL = #record.viewinterval:DECIMAL#
ATTRIBUTE = #record.attribute:VARCHAR#
CRUSER = #record.cruser:VARCHAR#
CRTIME = #record.crtime:TIMESTAMP#
PASSWORDLEV = #record.passwordlev:DECIMAL#
USERLEVEL = #record.userlevel:DECIMAL#
USERSM = #record.usersm:VARCHAR#
USERYM = #record.userym:VARCHAR#
USERPINYIN = #record.userpinyin:VARCHAR#
SYNSRCID = #record.synsrcid:VARCHAR#
USERPROVINCE = #record.userprovince:DECIMAL#
USERPIC = #record.userpic:VARCHAR#
EXPERTINTRO = #record.expertintro:VARCHAR#
DOMAIN = #record.domain:VARCHAR#
CRUSERID = #record.cruserid:DECIMAL#
QQ = #record.qq:VARCHAR#
PROVINCE = #record.province:VARCHAR#
CITY = #record.city:VARCHAR#
AREA = #record.area:VARCHAR#
BIRTHDAY = #record.birthday:TIMESTAMP#
SUMSCORE = #record.sumscore:DECIMAL#
SUMEXPERIENCE = #record.sumexperience:DECIMAL#
SPECIALTYPE = #record.specialtype:DECIMAL#
QQTOKEN = #record.qqtoken:VARCHAR#
QQUSERID = #record.qquserid:VARCHAR#
WEIBOTOKEN = #record.weibotoken:VARCHAR#
WEIBOUSERID = #record.weibouserid:VARCHAR#
HOLIDAY = #record.holiday:DECIMAL#

ANSWERCOUNT = #record.answercount:DECIMAL#
EXPERTTYPE = #record.experttype:DECIMAL#
DENSE = #record.dense:DECIMAL#

update IRP_USER set USERID = #record.userid:DECIMAL#, STATUS = #record.status:DECIMAL#, USERNAME = #record.username:VARCHAR#, PASSWORD = #record.password:VARCHAR#, NICKNAME = #record.nickname:VARCHAR#, SEX = #record.sex:DECIMAL#, TRUENAME = #record.truename:VARCHAR#, LOCATION = #record.location:VARCHAR#, TEL = #record.tel:VARCHAR#, MOBILE = #record.mobile:VARCHAR#, EMAIL = #record.firstlogintime:TIMESTAMP#, REGTIME = #record.regtime:TIMESTAMP#, LOGINTIMES = #record.logintimes:DECIMAL#, LASTLOGINTIME = #record.lastlogintime:TIMESTAMP#, LASTLOGOUTTIME = CRTIME = #record.crtime:TIMESTAMP#, PASSWORDLEV = #record.passwordlev:DECIMAL#, USERLEVEL = #record.userlevel:DECIMAL#, USERSM = #record.usersm:VARCHAR#, USERYM = #record.userym:VARCHAR#, USERPINYIN = #record.userpinyin:VARCHAR#, SYNSRCID = #record.synsrcid:VARCHAR#, USERPROVINCE = #record.userprovince:DECIMAL#, USERPIC = #record.userpic:VARCHAR#, EXPERTINTRO = #record.expertintro:VARCHAR#, DOMAIN = #record.domain:VARCHAR#, CRUSERID = #record.cruserid:DECIMAL#, QQ = #record.qq:VARCHAR#, PROVINCE = #record.province:VARCHAR#, CITY = #record.city:VARCHAR#, AREA = #record.area:VARCHAR#, BIRTHDAY = ANSWERCOUNT = #record.answercount:DECIMAL#, EXPERTTYPE = #record.experttype:DECIMAL#, DENSE = #record.dense:DECIMAL#

update IRP_USER
STATUS = #status:DECIMAL#
USERNAME = #username:VARCHAR#
PASSWORD = #password:VARCHAR#
NICKNAME = #nickname:VARCHAR#
SEX = #sex:DECIMAL#
TRUENAME = #truename:VARCHAR#
LOCATION = #location:VARCHAR#
TEL = #tel:VARCHAR#
MOBILE = #mobile:VARCHAR#
EMAIL = #email:VARCHAR#
REMINDERQUESTION = #reminderquestion:VARCHAR#
REMINDERANSWER = #reminderanswer:VARCHAR#
IFPUBMYINFO = #ifpubmyinfo:DECIMAL#
FIRSTLOGINTIME = #firstlogintime:TIMESTAMP#
REGTIME = #regtime:TIMESTAMP#
LOGINTIMES = #logintimes:DECIMAL#
LASTLOGINTIME = #lastlogintime:TIMESTAMP#
LASTLOGOUTTIME = #lastlogouttime:TIMESTAMP#
MSGINTERVAL = #msginterval:DECIMAL#
VIEWINTERVAL = #viewinterval:DECIMAL#
ATTRIBUTE = #attribute:VARCHAR#
CRUSER = #cruser:VARCHAR#
CRTIME = #crtime:TIMESTAMP#
PASSWORDLEV = #passwordlev:DECIMAL#
USERLEVEL = #userlevel:DECIMAL#
USERSM = #usersm:VARCHAR#
USERYM = #userym:VARCHAR#
USERPINYIN = #userpinyin:VARCHAR#
SYNSRCID = #synsrcid:VARCHAR#
USERPROVINCE = #userprovince:DECIMAL#
USERPIC = #userpic:VARCHAR#
EXPERTINTRO = #expertintro:VARCHAR#
DOMAIN = #domain:VARCHAR#
CRUSERID = #cruserid:DECIMAL#
QQ = #qq:VARCHAR#
PROVINCE = #province:VARCHAR#
CITY = #city:VARCHAR#
AREA = #area:VARCHAR#
BIRTHDAY = #birthday:TIMESTAMP#
SUMSCORE = #sumscore:DECIMAL#
SUMEXPERIENCE = #sumexperience:DECIMAL#
SPECIALTYPE = #specialtype:DECIMAL#
QQTOKEN = #qqtoken:VARCHAR#
QQUSERID = #qquserid:VARCHAR#
WEIBOTOKEN = #weibotoken:VARCHAR#
WEIBOUSERID = #weibouserid:VARCHAR#
HOLIDAY = #holiday:DECIMAL#
TOKEN = #token:VARCHAR#
ANSWERCOUNT = #answercount:DECIMAL#
EXPERTTYPE = #experttype:DECIMAL#
DENSE = #dense:DECIMAL#
where USERID = #userid:DECIMAL#

update IRP_USER set STATUS = #status:DECIMAL#, USERNAME = #username:VARCHAR#, PASSWORD = #password:VARCHAR#, NICKNAME = #nickname:VARCHAR#, SEX = #sex:DECIMAL#, TRUENAME = #truename:VARCHAR#, LOCATION = #location:VARCHAR#, TEL = #tel:VARCHAR#, MOBILE = #mobile:VARCHAR#, EMAIL = #email:VARCHAR#, REMINDERQUESTION = #reminderquestion:VARCHAR#, REMINDERANSWER = #reminderanswer:VARCHAR#, IFPUBMYINFO = #ifpubmyinfo:DECIMAL#, FIRSTLOGINTIME = #firstlogintime:TIMESTAMP#, REGTIME = #regtime:TIMESTAMP#, LOGINTIMES = #logintimes:DECIMAL#, LASTLOGINTIME = #lastlogintime:TIMESTAMP#, LASTLOGOUTTIME = #lastlogouttime:TIMESTAMP#, MSGINTERVAL = #msginterval:DECIMAL#, VIEWINTERVAL = #viewinterval:DECIMAL#, ATTRIBUTE = #attribute:VARCHAR#, CRUSER = #cruser:VARCHAR#, CRTIME = #crtime:TIMESTAMP#, PASSWORDLEV = #passwordlev:DECIMAL#, USERLEVEL = #userlevel:DECIMAL#, USERSM = #usersm:VARCHAR#, USERYM = #userym:VARCHAR#, USERPINYIN = #userpinyin:VARCHAR#, SYNSRCID = #synsrcid:VARCHAR#, USERPROVINCE = #userprovince:DECIMAL#, USERPIC = #userpic:VARCHAR#, EXPERTINTRO = #expertintro:VARCHAR#, DOMAIN = #domain:VARCHAR#, CRUSERID = #cruserid:DECIMAL#, QQ = #qq:VARCHAR#, PROVINCE = #province:VARCHAR#, CITY = #city:VARCHAR#, AREA = #area:VARCHAR#, BIRTHDAY = #birthday:TIMESTAMP#, SUMSCORE = #sumscore:DECIMAL#, SUMEXPERIENCE = #sumexperience:DECIMAL#, SPECIALTYPE = #specialtype:DECIMAL#, QQTOKEN = #qqtoken:VARCHAR#, QQUSERID = #qquserid:VARCHAR#, WEIBOTOKEN = #weibotoken:VARCHAR#, WEIBOUSERID = #weibouserid:VARCHAR#, HOLIDAY = #holiday:DECIMAL#, TOKEN = #token:VARCHAR#, ANSWERCOUNT = #answercount:DECIMAL#, EXPERTTYPE = #experttype:DECIMAL#, DENSE = #dense:DECIMAL# where USERID = #userid:DECIMAL#

update IRP_USER set STATUS=#status:DECIMAL#
REGTIME=#regtime:TIMESTAMP#
where userid in
#userids[]#

update IRP_USER set PASSWORD=#password:VARCHAR# where userid in
#userids[]#
sqlMap.select:
select * from IRP_USER where IRP_USER.status = #status:DECIMAL#
exists( select 1 from irp_usergroup_link where irp_user.userid=irp_usergroup_link.userid and irp_usergroup_link.groupid=#groupId:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
order by $orderStr$

select * from IRP_USER where IRP_USER.status = #status:DECIMAL#
exists( select 1 from irp_usergroup_link where irp_user.userid=irp_usergroup_link.userid and irp_usergroup_link.groupid=#groupId:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
irp_user.usersm like #sname:VARCHAR#
order by $orderStr$

select count(1) from irp_user where irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#
exists( select 1 from irp_usergroup_link where irp_user.userid=irp_usergroup_link.userid and irp_usergroup_link.groupid=#groupId:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#

select * from irp_user where exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#
order by $orderStr$

select * from irp_user where exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# ) and USERNAME=#expertName:DECIMAL#
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#
order by $orderStr$

select count(1) from irp_user where exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#

select count(1) from irp_user where exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# )
exists( select 1 from irp_expert_classify_link where irp_user.userid=irp_expert_classify_link.USERID and irp_expert_classify_link.classifyid=#classifyid:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#
select USERNAME from IRP_USER where USERID = #userid:DECIMAL#

select USERID,USERPIC,SEX,USERNAME from irp_user where userid!=#userid:DECIMAL# and status=30 and (irp_user.nickname like #nickname:VARCHAR# or irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR# or irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#) order by crtime desc

select * from irp_user where userid!=#userid:DECIMAL# and crtime between #begintime:DATETIME# and #endtime:DATETIME# and (irp_user.nickname like #nickname:VARCHAR# or irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR# or irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#) order by crtime desc
select USERNAME from IRP_USER where USERNAME=#name:VARCHAR# or TRUENAME=#name:VARCHAR# or NICKNAME=#name:VARCHAR#

select case when U.NICKNAME is null or U.NICKNAME='' then U.TRUENAME when U.TRUENAME is null or U.TRUENAME='' then U.USERNAME else U.NICKNAME end as SHOWNAME from IRP_USER U,IRP_MOST_TREAD M where M.CRUSERID = U.USERID and U.STATUS =#status:DECIMAL# and M.DOCID =#docid:DECIMAL# and M.STATUS =#statusmost:DECIMAL# and M.MOSTTYPE =#mosttype:DECIMAL# order by M.CRTIME desc
select USERID from IRP_USER where STATUS = #status:DECIMAL#
select USERID,USERNAME from IRP_USER where STATUS = #status:DECIMAL#
select USERID from IRP_USER where STATUS = #status:DECIMAL# and SPECIALTYPE = #specialtype:DECIMAL#
select COUNT(1)+1 as ranking from IRP_USER IU where IU.SUMSCORE>(select SUMSCORE from IRP_USER where USERID = #userid:DECIMAL#)

select case when (U.NICKNAME is null OR U.NICKNAME='') and (U.TRUENAME is not null OR U.TRUENAME!='') then U.TRUENAME when (U.TRUENAME is null OR U.TRUENAME='') and (U.USERNAME is not null OR U.USERNAME!='') then U.USERNAME else U.NICKNAME end as SHOWNAME from IRP_USER u where u.username=#username:VARCHAR#

select case when (U.NICKNAME is null OR U.NICKNAME='') and (U.TRUENAME is not null OR U.TRUENAME!='') then U.TRUENAME when (U.TRUENAME is null OR U.TRUENAME='') and (U.USERNAME is not null OR U.USERNAME!='') then U.USERNAME else U.NICKNAME end as SHOWNAME from IRP_USER u where u.userid=#userid:DECIMAL#
select sum(sumexperience) as SUMEXPERIENCE,sum(sumscore) as SUMSCORE from irp_user

select count(1) from irp_user where exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# ) and irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#
exists( select 1 from irp_expert_classify_link where irp_user.userid=irp_expert_classify_link.USERID and irp_expert_classify_link.classifyid=#classifyid:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#

select * from irp_user where exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# ) and irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#
exists( select 1 from irp_expert_classify_link where irp_user.userid=irp_expert_classify_link.USERID and irp_expert_classify_link.classifyid=#classifyid:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
order by $orderStr$

select USERID, STATUS, USERNAME, PASSWORD, NICKNAME, SEX, TRUENAME, LOCATION, TEL, MOBILE, EMAIL, REMINDERQUESTION, REMINDERANSWER, IFPUBMYINFO, FIRSTLOGINTIME, REGTIME, LOGINTIMES, LASTLOGINTIME, LASTLOGOUTTIME, MSGINTERVAL, VIEWINTERVAL, ATTRIBUTE, CRUSER, CRTIME, PASSWORDLEV, USERLEVEL, USERSM, USERYM, USERPINYIN, SYNSRCID, USERPROVINCE, USERPIC, EXPERTINTRO, DOMAIN, CRUSERID, QQ, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, BIRTHDAY, SUMSCORE, SUMEXPERIENCE, SPECIALTYPE, QQTOKEN, QQUSERID, WEIBOTOKEN, WEIBOUSERID,TOKEN,ANSWERCOUNT,EXPERTTYPE,DENSE from irp_user
order by $orderByClause$

select * from IRP_USER where IRP_USER.status = #status:DECIMAL# and IRP_USER.userid not in
#userids[]#
and exists( select 1 from irp_usergroup_link where IRP_USER.userid=irp_usergroup_link.userid )
exists( select 1 from irp_usergroup_link where irp_user.userid=irp_usergroup_link.userid and irp_usergroup_link.groupid=#groupId:DECIMAL# )
exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# )
IRP_USER.userid != #userid:DECIMAL#
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
order by crtime desc

select count(1) from IRP_USER where IRP_USER.status = #status:DECIMAL# and IRP_USER.userid not in
#userids[]#
and exists( select 1 from irp_usergroup_link where IRP_USER.userid=irp_usergroup_link.userid )
exists( select 1 from irp_usergroup_link where irp_user.userid=irp_usergroup_link.userid and irp_usergroup_link.groupid=#groupId:DECIMAL# )
exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# )
IRP_USER.userid != #userid:DECIMAL#
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
sqlMap.update: update IRP_USER set HOLIDAY = #holiday:DECIMAL# where USERID = #userid:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.select: select userid from IRP_USER

select * from irp_user where exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# )
exists( select 1 from irp_expert_classify_link where irp_user.userid=irp_expert_classify_link.USERID and irp_expert_classify_link.classifyid=#classifyid:DECIMAL# )
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#
order by $orderStr$

select * from irp_user where exists( select 1 from IRP_USERROLE_LINK where irp_user.userid=IRP_USERROLE_LINK.userid and IRP_USERROLE_LINK.roleid=#roleId:DECIMAL# ) and irp_user.experttype=#recommend:DECIMAL#
irp_user.username like #username:VARCHAR#
irp_user.truename like #truename:VARCHAR#
irp_user.status = #status:DECIMAL#
order by $orderStr$
$sql$
